description: Because life doesn’t get a rain delay. These tough all around, 100% waterproof boots help get your errands done, yard work complete and your rainy day to-do list more fun.Bogs Max-Wick™ pulls moisture away from the foot and DuraFresh™ helps naturally control odours.3mm Neo-Tech™ insulation adds warmth.Rebound cushioning under the heel and a contoured EVA footbed provide all-day comfort.Nylon shank in the footbed provides stability and support, great for rocky, uneven ground.Non-marking, chemical resistant BioGrip™ outsoles increase friction to reduce slippage.Self-cleaning lugs shed mud and debris.
name: Bogs Sauvie Slip on Rain Boots - Men's
